title: Glenda Jackson, two-time Oscar winner who paused acting for politics, dies at 87
description: Ms. Jackson spent nearly 25 years in Britain’s Parliament before returning to acting — playing the demanding role of King Lear — in her 80s.

title: Greek and E.U. policies under scrutiny after devastating shipwreck
description: The deaths of seemingly hundreds of migrants off the coast of Greece have sparked renewed criticism of the Greek coast guard and European migration policy.

title: Amid NATO divisions, U.S. backs incremental step for Ukraine’s entry
description: The Biden administration is said to be “comfortable” with a plan that would remove barriers to Ukraine's eventual membership in NATO.

title: Ukraine claims small territorial gains as counteroffensive grinds forward
description: Ukraine claimed modest advances but acknowledged facing fierce resistance by Russian forces dug in to fortified defenses in occupied territory.

title: CBP reassigns chief medical officer after child’s death in border custody
description: Homeland Security has removed the top medical official at Customs and Border Protection amid an investigation into the death of a girl held in U.S. custody

title: What to know about the report on Boris Johnson’s most damaging scandal yet
description: The U.K. Parliament’s Privileges Committee investigating the former prime minister’s “Partygate” scandal found that he misled lawmakers.

title: Boris Johnson deliberately misled Parliament over ‘Partygate,’ lawmakers conclude
description: Boris Johnson deliberately lied about covid lockdown parties, a U.K. Parliament report into "Partygate" finds.

title: As Ukraine presses counteroffensive, U.S. allies pivot to long-term needs
description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin convened allied defense ministers supporting Ukraine as the nations begin to finalize plans for long-term support for Kyiv.

title: In photos: Peru extends health emergency amid record dengue outbreak
description: Peru has recorded more than 140,000 cases and at least 200 deaths in the largest dengue outbreak in the South American nation’s history.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. defense secretary in Brussels for meetings on Ukraine
description: Lloyd Austin will host a meeting of the Ukraine Defense Contact Group, a gathering of leaders from dozens of countries assisting Kyiv’s war efforts.

title: Cash-strapped Taliban selling tickets to ruins of Buddhas it blew up
description: Embracing the Bamian site is not only a gesture to archaeologists, Taliban officials suggest, but also a sign the regime is more pragmatic than in its first rule.

title: Zaporizhzhia steel plant refuses to bend to Russian attacks
description: The metalworks plant is a symbol of Ukrainian resistance against Russian aggression.
